title: Fragment, 18th century
description: Breadth of cream satin with design in pastel chain stitch and touches of black.  Set sidewise on it: arched garland caught with bow and heavy tassels at top over small landscape with crane-like bird bent over snail.  Sides cut in shape of arms of cross.  Two broad selvages with pink pencil stripes, narrow cloth outer edge.

tombstone.epitaph:
Fragment, 18th century.
18th century. Technique: embroidered on plain satin. Gift of Richard C. Greenleaf. 1954-167-8-a.
